newsitem.title: UK: RUGBY LEAGUE-WORLD CLUB CHAMPIONSHIP QUARTER-FINAL DRAW.
newsitem.headline: RUGBY LEAGUE-WORLD CLUB CHAMPIONSHIP QUARTER-FINAL DRAW.

text.p: Draw for the quarter-finals of the world club championship made on Monday:
Brisbane (Australia) v St Helens (Britain) or Paris St Germain (France)
Matches to be played October 4 and 5.
Remaining European qualifying match between St Helens (pool A) and Paris St Germain (pool B) to be played on August 13.
